channel.title: How do i make my server on 24/7?
channel.description: ok hopefully your here to help me and not make fun of me cuz i cant do this but... i need help on how to get my server to get on 24/7 i dont know how. so if anyone is out there thats feeling generous and knows how to... help? :o :o

item.title: How do i make my server on 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

Easy wau:

no-ip.com
download DUC
always have it running
download the attachment
place in your server folder
the attachment is made by 1 of the best coder/programs ever…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server on 24/7?

item.title: How do i make my server on 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @I_Fix_I I Fix I
item.description:
@I_Fix_I wrote:

[quote=“bash 218, post:4, topic:148682”][quote author=I Fix I link=topic=203871.msg1798018#msg1798018 date=1191459041]

ok hopefully your here to help me and not make fun of me cuz i cant do this but… i need help on how to get my server to get on 24/7 i dont know how. so if anyone is out there thats feeling generous and knows how to… help? :o :o

You could just keep it running all night and when you go to school =) that’s what I would do XD. Just get a auto re-starter and leave your server running.
[/quote]well i cant leave my server running all night my parents say its bad for the electric bill… soo if you know how to get and use the auto restarter could you explain that to me??[/quote]
Well some auto-restarts come with servers, but you would have to have your computer on 24/7 to make it 24/7 server.

Read full topic
